pstnCarrier.description: Name of the Carrier you created for your SIP provider.

retellCarrier.description: Name of the Carrier you created for Retell.

sipUsername.description: Username of the SIP client you created to authenticate with Retell.

sipPassword.description: Password of the SIP client you created to authenticate with Retell.

countryCode.description: Provide your local telephony country code if your PSTN carrier delivers calls in national number format, otherwise leave empty.

overrideCallerId.description: Provide a caller ID number if you want all outbound calls from Retell to have a specified caller ID that is different than the calling number received from Retell.

overrideDialedNumber.description: When sending calls to Retell, replace the incoming dialed number with this value.  This is useful if you are receiving calls from a PBX extension but need to send a proper E.164 number to Retell.
